hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Regime Transition via BTC Dominance Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: When the market is in a NEUTRAL regime (confidence >60%) and BTC dominance experiences a sharp 3-day decline of >2% while BTC price holds above its 20-day moving average, a rotation into high-beta altcoins (SOL, AVAX) will outperform BTC over the following 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes often precede bull transitions. Sharp BTC dominance drops while BTC remains healthy suggests capital rotation into alts, which typically leads alt rallies. High-beta coins like SOL/AVAX capture this rotation most aggressively.
entry_conditions: Enter SOL/USD and AVAX/USD long positions

exit_conditions.stop_loss: 3% drawdown from entry on aggregate position

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Aggregate altcoin position fails to outperform BTC over 5 days OR experiences >3% drawdown during holding period.
